item.title: "Con las patentes no habría sido posible la Capilla Sixtina" · ELPAÍS.com
item.description: \"Con las patentes no habría sido posible la Capilla Sixtina\": Es como un campusero más. Jon Hall se sienta hab... http://bit.ly/om52xw
item.content:encoded: \"Con las patentes no habría sido posible la Capilla Sixtina\": Es como un campusero más. Jon Hall se sienta hab... http://bit.ly/om52xw Es como un campusero más. Jon Hall se sienta habitualmente en una de las primeras mesas del Ágora de la Ciudad de las Artes y las Ciencias de Valencia, como cualquier otro participante. Habla con todos los que se le acercan, que son muchos. Repartidos por las mesas de las dos sedes que este año tiene el evento, se encuentran decenas de pingüinos, símbolo de la marca debido a la aficción del arquitecto de Linux por este animal. Eso da una idea de la cantidad de fans que el software libre tiene entre los participantes. Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: elpais.com

item.description: Twitter, launched five years ago, delivers 350 billion tweets a day - Los Angeles Times http://cfy.me/_dxCZ
item.content:encoded: Twitter, launched five years ago, delivers 350 billion tweets a day - Los Angeles Times http://cfy.me/_dxCZ Twitter 5-years old: Twitter launched publicly 5-years ago, on July 13, 2006, and has gone from an unknown text-messaging and web service then called "Twttr" to one of the biggest forces in social media. On Friday, Twitter's Engineering department said in a message sent out over the microblogging service that 350 billion tweets were delivered each day. Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: latimes.com

item.title: 2012 SXSW PanelPicker Deadline Extended | SXSW.com
item.description: Good news! We have extended the #SXSW #PanelPicker deadline deadline until 11:59pm CDT, this Sunday, July 17! http://ow.ly/5FI1T
item.content:encoded: Good news! We have extended the #SXSW #PanelPicker deadline deadline until 11:59pm CDT, this Sunday, July 17! http://ow.ly/5FI1T Good news! We have extended the PanelPicker deadline deadline until 11:59pm CDT, this Sunday, July 17. Why the extension? With all the emails and questions we've received in the past 24 hours, we realize you still have a lot of questions about how to write your best SXSW PanelPicker proposal. Now is your chance to perfect the programming idea you've been working on and get your idea in before it's too late. Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: sxsw.com

item.title: instagr.am
item.description: 1 year ago today we tested the first photo upload to an app we would later call Instagram. Here's the photo: http://cot.ag/przg7B
item.content:encoded: 1 year ago today we tested the first photo upload to an app we would later call Instagram. Here's the photo: http://cot.ag/przg7B 1 year ago we tested the first photo upload to an app we called Codename. A little less than 3 months after that, in October, we launched Instagram to the public. Now, 9 months later, over 6 million people have shared more than 100 million photos with one another on Instagram. Thanks for being a part of the Instagram community, and here's to 100 million more photos! Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: instagr.am
